=== EPISODE: Build project ===
start_process: npm run build
read_process_output: > build started
read_process_output: > build finished

=== EPISODE: Run tests ===
start_process: pytest -q
read_process_output: > running tests
read_process_output: > tests complete

=== EPISODE: Fetch remote data ===
start_process: curl https://example.com
read_process_output: > 200 OK

=== EPISODE: Stall ===
start_process: sleep 10
